project_2_description_1: Community-driven Ukrainian localization of Dungeons 3, which covered all stages of creating a full game localization — from receiving and organizing the original texts to translating, editing, technical integration, game modding, and in-game testing. The project involved adapting dialogues, narration, jokes, and cultural references to ensure they sounded natural for Ukrainian players while preserving the game’s signature humor and tone.
project_2_description_2: In addition to linguistic work, the process included handling technical aspects such as file extraction, tag and variable integrity, font editing, UI adjustments, asset preparation, and reintegration into the game. During this project, I delved into the specifics of each role and worked through every step of the localization workflow, from linguistic adaptation to technical implementation, gaining comprehensive hands-on experience across the entire pipeline.
project_2_skill_5: Font editing & integration of custom character sets
project_2_skill_6: Unity asset extraction & basic game modding
project_2_fact_1: Served as a foundation for further research and projects, including content analysis and tool development.
project_2_fact_2: Some jokes required a deep dive into the music industry to make them land in Ukrainian.
project_2_fact_3: Presenting the localization turned me into the embodiment of Absolute Evil.
project_1_description_1: Community-driven Ukrainian translation of Warcraft – Heartlands. During this project, I translated and edited the full text, ensuring stylistic consistency, accurate terminology, and faithful adaptation of the original tone. The completed translation was then published as a fully accessible website, allowing fans to read the story in Ukrainian.
project_1_description_2: The project combined literary translation, stylistic editing, and web publishing, giving me hands-on experience in presenting localized content in a digital format while maintaining readability and immersion for the audience.
project_1_skill_3: Editing and refining the text for natural Ukrainian flow
project_1_fact_1: Published as a fully accessible website, making the translation available to fans.
project_1_fact_2: Maintained original tone and immersion, ensuring the story felt natural and engaging in Ukrainian.
